documentation.text:
@title VePikaTokenReward
@notice Contract to distribute token rewards for vePIKA holders. Adapted from: https://github.com/ribbon-finance/governance/blob/main/contracts/rbn-staking/VeRBNRewards.sol

@notice earning for an account
  @return amount of tokens earned

rewardPerToken().details: gives the total amount of rewards distributed since inception of the pool per vault token

queueNewRewards(uint256).notice: Add new rewards to be distributed over the duration

updateReward(address).notice: use to update rewards on vePIKA balance changes.

userdoc.notice: Contract to distribute token rewards for vePIKA holders. Adapted from: https://github.com/ribbon-finance/governance/blob/main/contracts/rbn-staking/VeRBNRewards.sol
